title: Casino Critique
author: Casino Critique
content: Hello community,We are adding few content writers to write casino related contents for our platform. If you are a good writer and have interest in gambling then this is a perfect position for you. You will work with our team under supervision of the team leader.Unfortunately right now we can not hire you by monthly basis salary. If you are interested then you will be offering partnership from a certain percentage of the revenue we will make. Depending on your performance we will offer you better percentage after 6 months. You will work 4 hours per day, 5 days a week in a virtual environment.At Casino Critique, we are working to create an unbiased and outspoken crypto casino guide to enhance gambling experience for gamblers. Our ultimate goal is to be one of the leaders in Casino Guide in the year 2027.Please contact with your bitcointalk profile link on our Telegram: @CasinoCritiqueCheers,
